name="ページ1" id="JFECwEL1uDYYFKoyOX9N"> <mxGraphModel dx="2154" dy="-356" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="gyo4TOFb3uvC-cAI7Nvi-127" parent="1" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" value="" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="2890" width="740" x="-360" y="1820" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gyo4TOFb3uvC-cAI7Nvi-128" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#000000;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=18;spacing=20;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" value="<div style="line-height: 140%;">↓getBookByIDリゾルバに渡ってくるargs</div><div style="line-height: 140%;">{ id: "1" }</div><div style="line-height: 140%;">↓Bookのtitleリゾルバに渡ってくるargs</div><div style="line-height: 140%;">{ vol: 1 }<br><div style="line-height: 140%;"><br></div><div style="line-height: 140%;">↓createBookリゾルバに渡ってくるargs</div><div style="line-height: 140%;">{ id: "3", title: "カラマーゾフの兄弟" }</div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><div style="line-height: 140%;">↓Bookのtitleリゾルバに渡ってくるargs<br></div><div style="line-height: 160%;">{ vol: 2}</div></div><div></div></div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="280" width="660" x="-320" y="4370" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gyo4TOFb3uvC-cAI7Nvi-129" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=24;fontStyle=1" value="リゾルバ関数の引数<div>第2引数: args</div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="70" width="222.62" x="-101.30999999999995" y="1840" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gyo4TOFb3uvC-cAI7Nvi-130" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#000000;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=18;spacing=10;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" value="<div>import { <span style="">ApolloServer</span> } from "@apollo/server";</div><div>import { startStandaloneServer } from "@apollo/server/standalone";</div><div><br></div><div><span style="color: rgb(0, 204, 0);">//スキーマ定義</span></div><span style="">const</span> <span style="">typeDefs</span> = <span style="">`#graphql</span><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	type Book {</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	id: ID!</span><br></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">		title (<span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 255);">vol: Int</span>): String</span><br></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	type Query {</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	getBookByID (id: ID!): Book</span><br></span></span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span></span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>type Mutation {</span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	createBook(id: ID!, title: String)</span><br></span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}<br></span><div><span style="">`;</span></div><div><span style=""><br></span></div><div><span style="color: rgb(0, 204, 0);">//DBデータの代わり</span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style="line-height: 140%;">const books = [</span></div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><span style=""><span style="white-space: pre;">	{ <span style="color: rgb(0, 204, 0);">//Book1</span></span></span></div><div><span style=""><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	id: "1",</span><br></span></span></div><div><span style=""><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	title: "グレートギャッツビー"</span><br></span></span></span></div><div><span style=""><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>},</span><br></span></div><div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	{ <span style="color: rgb(0, 204, 0);">//Book2</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">		id: "2",<br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">		title: "動物農場"<br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	}</span></div></div><div><span style="">];</span></div><div><br></div><div><span style="color: rgb(0, 204, 0);">//リゾルバ定義</span></div><div><span style="">const</span> <span style="">resolvers</span> = {</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	Query: {</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	<span style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">getBookByID</span>: (<span style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">parent</span><span style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">,</span><span style="color: rgb(255, 51, 51);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">args</span>) =&gt; {</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span></span></span><span style="white-space: pre;">console.log("↓</span><span style="white-space: pre;">getBookByID</span><span style="white-space: pre;">リゾルバに渡ってくるargs</span><span style="white-space: pre;">");</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">			console.log(</span><span style="white-space: pre; color: rgb(255, 51, 51);">args</span><span style="white-space: pre;">);</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	return books</span></span></span></span><span style="white-space: pre;">;</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>},</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	Mutation: {</span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	<span style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">createBook</span>: (parent, <span style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">args</span>) =&gt; {</span></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	console.log("↓createBook</span></span></span></span><span style="white-space: pre;">リゾルバに渡ってくるargs</span><span style="white-space: pre;">");</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>console.log(</span><span style="white-space: pre; color: rgb(255, 51, 51);">args</span><span style="white-space: pre;">);</span><span style="white-space: pre;"><br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="color: rgb(51, 255, 51);">//Bookの新規作成&amp;登録処理</span></span></span></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	const newBook = {</span></span></span></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="white-space: pre;">id: args.id,</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>title: args.title</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>};</span><br></span></span></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	books.push(</span></span></span></span></span><span style="white-space: pre;">newBook</span><span style="white-space: pre;">)</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">		return </span><span style="white-space: pre;">newBook;</span><br></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>},</span><br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	Book: {</span></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	<span style="color: rgb(255, 255, 0);">title</span>: (parent, <span style="color: rgb(255, 51, 51);">args</span>) =&gt; {</span></span></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	console.log("↓Bookのtitleリゾルバに渡ってくるargs");</span><br></span></span></span></span><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>console.log(<span style="color: rgb(255, 51, 51);">args</span>);</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	return `${parent.title} ~ Vol.${args.vol}`;</span><br></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br></span></span></div><div>};</div><div><br></div><div><span style="color: rgb(0, 204, 0);">//GraphQLサーバー作成</span></div><div><span style="">const</span> <span style="">server</span> = <span style="">new</span> <span style="">ApolloServer</span>({</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	typeDefs,</span><br></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	resolvers</span><br></span></div><div>});</div><div><br></div></div><div><span style="color: rgb(0, 204, 0);">//htttpサーバーを起動(GraphQLサーバーをミドルウェアみたいに渡す)</span></div><div>const { url } = await startStandaloneServer(</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	server,</span><br></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>{</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	listen: { port: 4000 }</span><br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span></div><div>);</div><div><br></div><div>console.log(url);</div>" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry height="1880" width="660" x="-320" y="1950" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gyo4TOFb3uvC-cAI7Nvi-131" parent="1" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=#000000;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;fontSize=18;spacing=10;fontColor=#FFFFFF;" value="<div style="line-height: 150%;">query GetBookByID {<div><span style="white-space: pre;">	getBookByID(id: "1") {</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	id</span><br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	title (<span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 255);">vol: 1</span>)</span><br></span></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span>}</span><br><div>}</div><div style="line-height: 140%;"><br></div><div>mutation CreateBook {</div><div><span style="white-space: pre;">	createBook(id: "3", title: "カラマーゾフの兄弟") {</span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;">	</span><span style="white-space: pre;">	id</span><br></span></div><div><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: pre;"><span style="white-space: rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 622px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2690px; margin-left: 60px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#FFFFFF, #121212); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
